name: Markus Anetsberger
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Started with work, ended with passion. The more I have to do with it, the more I realize the enormous power of JavaScript. I'm very curious if node is not just a hype but a long term server side solution.
what_can_i_contribute: Development of large angular apps like structure and usage of gulp. Also the usage of Leaflet with respect to extensions and projections.
